definition: father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
uncle (polite form of address for older male)
Bernanke (name)/Ben Shalom Bernanke (1953-), US economist, Chairman of Fed from 2006
Bo Le (horse connoisseur during Spring and Autumn Period)/a good judge of talent/talent scout

sentences.english: Battelle asks if Yahoo is talking to Microsoft about any kind of deal.
sentences.chinese: 伯特立问雅虎是否在跟微软商讨某项交易。

sentences.english: Hearing this, Wilbur threw himself down in an agony of pain and sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 听到这话，威尔伯瘫坐下来，极度痛苦和悲伤。

sentences.english: It was Mr Boldwood, who had a large farm in Weatherbury.
sentences.chinese: 此人是伯德伍德先生，他在威瑟伯里拥有一个大农场。

sentences.english: Then Israel came to Egypt, Jacob settled in the land of Ham.
sentences.chinese: 从此以色列进入了埃及，雅各伯也就在含邦作客。

sentences.english: Also that Elizabeth her cousin is six months pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 她的亲戚以利沙伯已经怀孕六个月。

sentences.english: Battelle then asks about the Google search marketing deal, which fell apart today.
sentences.chinese: 伯特立接着询问了与今天放弃的谷歌搜索广告交易。

sentences.english: On his way back to Coggan's house, Gabriel met Boldwood.
sentences.chinese: 盖伯瑞尔在回考根家的路上，遇到了伯德伍德。

sentences.english: Wilbur and Orville Wright had 4 wanted to fly.
sentences.chinese: 威尔伯和奥维尔赖特有4要飞。

sentences.english: He asked if Mr Gilbert's operation had been successful.
sentences.chinese: 他问吉尒伯特学生的手术是否胜利。

sentences.english: Mr. Doub makes these suggestions for making rules in your home.
sentences.chinese: 都伯先生为你制定的家庭规则提出如下建议。

sentences.english: Wilbur didn't care. He kept walking toward the pail of slops.
sentences.chinese: 威尔伯不在意，继续朝泔水桶走去。

sentences.english: "It's like a business prenup," Staub says.
sentences.chinese: 斯特伯形容说，“这就像企业的婚前协议”。

sentences.english: Bernice is going to let me use her computer.
sentences.chinese: 伯妮斯同意让我用她的电脑。

sentences.english: His black, ophidian eyes fixed on Burak.
sentences.chinese: 他黑色的毒蛇眼珠紧盯在伯拉克身上。

sentences.english: 'By the way, did you notice Mr Boldwood in church this morning?'
sentences.chinese: 哎，今天早晨在教堂你注意伯德伍德先生了吗？

definition: marquis, second of the five orders of ancient Chinese nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/nobleman or high official
ancient bronze wine holder with 3 legs and loop handle/nobility

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
crown prince/heir of a noble house
to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
elder brother/term of respect for a man of about the same age
see 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] and 閼氏|阏氏[yan1 zhi1]
